title: Erik Truffaz - Rendez-Vous (Paris - Benares - Mexico)
description:
Erik Truffaz - Rendez-Vous (Paris - Benares - Mexico) (Blue Note / 2008)


Paris (Disc 1)

Erik Truffaz - trumpet, voice "The Fly"
Sly Johnson - voices

01 - Mr Wyatt [05:08]
02 - Come Together [03:00]
03 - Addis Abeba [04:47]
04 - Nature Boy [03:01]
05 - Nina's Dream [03:57]
06 - La Mouche [03:17]
07 - Goodbye Tomorrow [02:55]
08 - Don't Stop [03:35]
09 - The Fly [06:29]


Benares (Disc 2)

Erik Truffaz - trumpet
Malcolm Braff - piano
Apurba Mukherjee - tabla
Indrani Mukeherjee - voices

01 - Tarana [18:27]
02 - Saraswati [05:52]
03 - Yay! [06:37]
04 - Anil (Live At Cully) [09:45]
05 - Tribute (Live At Cully) [08:02]


Mexico (Disc 3)

Erik Truffaz - trumpet
Murcof - other sounds

01 - Al Mediodia [07:35]
02 - Good News From The Desert [11:09]
03 - Avant L'aube [08:36]
